column5: Does anyone know a quick way to drum up past weather data? Temp, wind, barometer, moon phase etc ? I am trying to reverse engineer a fishing log for the Indian Lake Chain (north of Vermillion Bay, east of Dryden) for the last 5 years and match the weather data up with my foggy memory (oh had I just been diligent and kept a log !). I find some data on internet searches but it is fairly scant. Anyone have a good site?Thanks

What I'd suggest - Same data but sometimes easier to read or read multiple days. Got to main page - select your area then click station select for a preferred station in the area or click on the one already there (it's in a purple/bluish color), Then you have various ways to view - weekly,monthly, etc. I run a personal weather station and report to Wunderground. Although I have more data in my own database, I regularly use this to not only see my own data without going to the wx terminal. Also use it for other areas as you need.
Thanks Gents, that was exactly what I was looking for! Now it will be sooo much easier when I keep a daily log in the future!
